snippet: Richard Siewert Jr., the former counselor to Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner, will lead the public relations effort at Goldman Sachs, replacing Lucas van Praag.
abstract: Richard Siewert Jr., the former counselor to Treasury Secretary Timothy F. Geithner, will lead the public relations effort at Goldman Sachs, replacing Lucas van Praag.

headline.main: Goldman Hires a New P.R. Chief
